display_long_description:
🌊The new stage "Deep Dive Sector" is finally here!🌊
And this time you're not climbing... you're descending!!
Those skilled enough to escape can earn an exclusive new cosmetic!
Can you make it out alive?

⛓️ Linked by Chains, Bound by Fate ⛓️
"Chained Escape" is an immersive VR game where players control penguins chained together, striving to reach the summit. Supporting multiplayer for up to 4 players, you'll need teamwork and strategy—sometimes helping each other, sometimes causing chaos—as you race to clear the game before your energy runs out!

💪 Master the Physics-Based Chain Mechanics 💪
Use realistic physics to manipulate chains and control your movement as well as your teammates'. Rescue friends by catching their chains at the last second or desperately swing through mid-air toward safe ground. Sometimes, you might even discover a solution no one else has imagined!

🐧 Rewrite the Penguins' Harsh Destiny! 🐧
You play as imprisoned penguins subjected to grueling forced labor. Break free from a suspicious spaceship crafting mysterious objects, and escape to secure your freedom
